mapper.select: select LPAD(count(*), 3,0) as "ordrSCnt" from rsc_ordr where ordr_cd like '%'||#{ordrSCnt}||'%'
select r.rsc_cd, r.rsc_nm, v.vend_cd, v.vend_nm, s.rsc_stc, s.saf_stc from rsc r join vend v on v.vend_cd=r.vend_cd join rsc_stc s on 1=1
select r.rsc_cd, r.rsc_nm, v.vend_cd, v.vend_nm, s.rsc_stc, s.saf_stc from rsc r join vend v on v.vend_cd=r.vend_cd join rsc_stc s on 1=1 where r.rsc_nm LIKE '%'||#{rscNm}||'%'
select r.rsc_cd, r.rsc_nm, v.vend_cd, v.vend_nm, s.rsc_stc, s.saf_stc from rsc r join vend v on v.vend_cd=r.vend_cd join rsc_stc s on 1=1 where r.rsc_cd = #{rscCd}
